name: Negrumi
description: A variant of the best known Negroni with addition of pink grapefruit. The name is a portmanteau that blends the two words "Negroni" and "Agrumi" (italian for "Citrus fruits") together.
directions: Combine the spirits into a mixing glass with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with large ice cubes.
Garnish with a slice of pink grapefruit.
